reportText: Found a large grey cat with a blue collar in Krogers parking lot.
There was a large light brown dog that looked to be a chow mixed hanging out at the park.
I saw a well kept kitten with a collar on it's bell roaming around the neighborhood .
I saw what looked to be brown lab with an orange collar near a coffee shop downtown.
I saw a black dog with a collar walking across the intersection of 3rd and Winchester.
White cat with a caller spotted laying under a tree.
I saw a dog who looked lost in the parkign lot. It was medium sized and appeared to be mixed with a poodle.
There was a large dalmation seen running around the school yard. It had a red collar.
I found a black cat with blue collar hiding behind a large trash bin.
I saw a turtle on the sidewalk. This is unusual so I figured it might belong to someone .
